thread.section_title: Dive Right In Scuba Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dive Right In Scuba | www.diverightinscuba.com
thread.title: Steve K
thread.title_full: Dive Right In Scuba reviewed by Steve K

author: Steve K
title: Steve K
text: I ordered my new Halcyon BP/W from DRIS but unfortunately it was out of stock. But as soon as it came in, they immediately shipped it out to me. They kept me informed the entire time and assured me it would arrive in time for my dive trip. And it did. Their customer service is excellent and they made sure that I got the exact model I wanted. I look forward to my next order with them.
